DOC.brief_summary: This study evaluate safety , effectiveness , maintenance effect novel topical silver particle solution ( Sienna 755.1100 , 810.1100 , 1064.1100 ) use conjunction laser treatment Acne Vulgaris .
DOC.brief_title: Long-term Follow-up Study Subjects Who Completed Clinical Studies 755.1100_FA , 810.1100_FA , 1064.1100_FA
DOC.criteria: Subject participate study 755.1100_FA , 810.1100_FA , 1064.1100_FA fulfil study 's exit criterion ( ie , completion final visit [ visit 7 ] study ) . Subject follow predecessor study restriction prior study entry . Subject able provide inform consent Health Insurance Portability Accountability Act ( HIPAA ) ; minor addition parent legal guardian provide consent . Subject willing comply schedule , procedure , restriction study . Subjects treatment condition ( eg , pregnancy metabolic disease ) may affect assessment safety efficacy since enrollment predecessor study .
